welcome_message_body: Welcome to Liberia, Costa Rica! Known as the "White City" for its charming white-washed colonial buildings, we invite you to explore and experience the natural beauty and rich culture of our city. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Daniel Oduber International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Daniel Oduber International Airport serves flights to and from nearby countries in Central America.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Canas Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and cargo operations at Canas Airport.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Punta Islita Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Playa Samara Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Flamingo Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Flamingo Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upala Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Upala Airport handles all incoming and outgoing freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
